thread.title: Obama to keep 5,500 US troops in Afghanistan beyond 2016
thread.title_full: Obama to keep 5,500 US troops in Afghanistan beyond 2016

title: Obama to keep 5,500 US troops in Afghanistan beyond 2016
text:
Obama to keep 5,500 US troops in Afgh... Obama to keep 5,500 US troops in Afghanistan beyond 2016 There are 12 comments on the Fox News story from 12 hrs ago, titled Obama to keep 5,500 US troops in Afghanistan beyond 2016 . In it, Fox News reports that: 
President Barack Obama will keep 5,500 U.S. troops in Afghanistan when he leaves office in 2017, according to senior administration officials, casting aside his promise to end the war on his watch and instead ensuring he hands the conflict off to his successor. Obama had originally planned to pull out all but a small, embassy-based U.S. military presence by the end of next year, a timeline coinciding with the final weeks of his presidency. Join the discussion below, or Read more at Fox News.
